title: Calories in McDonald's Sweet Tea
meta_description: Discover calories in McDonald's sweet tea for a medium serving, including carbs, sugars, and nutrition facts. Quick breakdowns and size variations included.
assumptions: Medium size (21 fl oz / 620 ml), freshly brewed black tea with sugar; no added flavors or lemon.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by location, batch, and exact size; values based on McDonald's standard recipe. Check app or receipt for specifics.

quick_answer.text: A medium McDonald's sweet tea contains 90 calories, mostly from 23 g of sugars.

label_note: Totals mirror Nutrition Facts fields for easy comparison.

tweaks.label: Small size (16 fl oz) instead of medium
Large size (30 fl oz) instead of medium

faqs.q: How many calories in a medium McDonald's sweet tea?
faqs.a: About 90 calories for a medium (21 fl oz) serving.

faqs.q: Are there carbs in McDonald's sweet tea?
faqs.a: Yes, 23 g of carbs per medium serving, all from added sugars.

faqs.q: Calories in McDonald's sweet tea small vs large?
faqs.a: Small (16 fl oz): 70 kcal; large (30 fl oz): 130 kcal.

faqs.q: Is McDonald's sweet tea high in sugar?
faqs.a: Yes, a medium has 23 g of sugarsâ€”equivalent to about 6 tsp.

faqs.q: Does McDonald's sweet tea have caffeine?
faqs.a: Yes, approximately 38 mg per medium serving from black tea.
